cast.name: 尼科斯·库尔库洛斯 Nikos Kourkoulos
梅丽·赫罗诺普卢 Mairi Hronopoulou
马诺斯·卡特拉基斯 Manos Katrakis

writer.name: 尼柯·福斯柯罗斯 Nikos Foskolos

director.name: 尼柯·福斯柯罗斯 Nikos Foskolos

introduction: Angelos (Nikos Kourkoulos) is the sole survivor of a shipwreck. When called to testify, he reveals that the wreck occurred because of insufficient maintenance. Crushed by the burden of guilt, the shipowner (Spiros Kalogirou) commits suicide, and his brother (Manos Katrakis) does everything in his power to destroy Angelos. However, he marries the shipowner’s daughter (Mary Chronopoulou) and takes over the company. From that position, he discovers the entire dirty story behind the shipwreck.He gives up his job, abandons his wife and returns to his former sweetheart (Anna Vagena).
